name: NWParameters.PrivacyContext
desc: An object that defines the privacy requirements for a set of connections.

items.name: init(description: String)
items.desc: Initializes a privacy context with a description string.

items.name: static let `default`: NWParameters.PrivacyContext
items.desc: The privacy context that applies to all connections that do not use a custom context.

items.name: func disableLogging()
items.desc: Disables system logging of connection activity.

items.name: func flushCache()
items.desc: Flushes all cached data, such as TLS session state, created by connections associated with the privacy context.

items.name: var debugDescription: String
items.desc: The description string you provide when creating the context.

items.name: func requireEncryptedNameResolution(Bool, fallbackResolver: NWParameters.PrivacyContext.ResolverConfiguration?)
items.desc: Requires that any DNS name resolution for connections associated with this context use encrypted transports, such as TLS or HTTPS.

items.name: enum NWParameters.PrivacyContext.ResolverConfiguration
items.desc: A DNS server configuration that uses TLS or HTTPS.
